message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of your product, but I believe I can only pay $9500 for it.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $9500 is still below my minimum. I'm willing to come down to $11000 for you.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I am able to offer $10500. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10500 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11500. This is a fair compromise that allows us both to get what we want. Let's make this deal happen.
Alice, I've considered your latest offer and I'm willing to go up to $10750 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate,  $10750 is still a bit low for me. I'm firm on my last offer of $11500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  I'm ready to make this deal happen, but if we can't agree, I'll have to move on to other opportunities.
Alice, I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. I am now willing to offer $11000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
